metadata.title: Gosasa Big Dial Analog Digital Watches S Shock Men Military Army Wrist Watch 50M Waterproof Alarm Stopwatch Luminous Hands LED Sports Watch (Denim Black)
features: 164FT WATERPROOF: 164 ft waterproof (50 M) - 5ATM water resistant. NOTE: please DO NOT press any buttons in the water.

DUAL DIAL TWO TIMEZONE: analog and digital dual dial support two different timezone. Shock resistant, stop watch, military 12H/24H time, and LED back light functions make it perfect for all kind of sport and daily use.
COMFORT with FASHION: silicon rubber watch band with the large dual dial design make it comfortable to wear and lead you to edge sport fashion. Perfect for both indoor and outdoor activities.
MULTI-FUNCTIONAL: Dual Timezone, Calendar Day and Date, Alarm, Water Resistant, LED Display, Back Light, Shock Resistant, Stop Watch.
WHAT IS IN THE PACKAGE: Dual Dial Sport Watch x 1, Instruction Manual x 1
description: Specification: Dial Color: Titanium Black Dial Case Diameter: 2.09 inch / 5.5 cm Dial Case Thickness: 0.59 inch / 1.5 cm Band Color: Black Band width: 0.79 inch / 2 cm Band Length: 10.43 inch / 26.5 cm. Band Clasp Type: Buckle Watch Weight: 3 oz / 85 g Battery Code: CR2025 / SR626SW  Powerful dial with dual time, digital numbers with night vision function, easy to read, suitable for check the time and date. in any environment. At the same time, you can read the time by hands, also with the calendar function, very convenient. A clear scale within the bezel is a major highlight of the watch. The dial design looks very layered and sense of technology.   Material: Case Material: PC (Poly-Carbonate) Band Material: PU (Polyurethane) Silicone Mirror Surface: High Hardness Resin Glass

title: Men's Watches, Military Sports Watches, Compass, Water Resistant
